com.compendium.ui
Class UIButton

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JButton
                      com.compendium.ui.UIButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class UIButton
extends javax.swing.JButton

This class extends JButton and was implemented so all the buttons used in Compendium have the same font. Will be use for more in the future.

See Also:
Serialized Form
